Plot: Two couples looking to spice up their relationships on a weekend retreat find some unexpected results after crossing into the world of Sonya, an eccentric polyamorist, and her clan of strange but lovable followers.
Title: Wide Open
Writer: Emily Montague, Melissa Pino, Samantha Watkins
Actors: Bonnie Afsary, Cathy Carlson, Lodric D. Collins, DeDe Drake
